report.title: White Picket Fence
report.author: Mamajama
report.bodytext: 12:00 AM. wife and kids asleep. i go downstairs into the playroom /n and smoke one bong hit of the extract. within 20 seconds, i became one of the pickets of a white picket fence. no other memories of my life or even the fact that i am a living person. i was never living. i was, am, and will always be just a part of a white picket fence. i opened my eyes out of fear and it took a minute or so to realize i am a person. now, as far as the white picket fence is concerned, i think i have a clue. i was telling my wife before she went to bed that i want to go on a vacation with the family because life was feeling pretty routine. so maybe me being part of a fence is the manifestation of sameness, routine, etc...
